author: cnbc.com
title: Cherry Hill Mortgage Investment Corporation Provides Updated Date and Time for Earnings Release and Conference Call for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017
text:
MOORESTOWN, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Cherry Hill Mortgage Investment Corporation (NYSE: CHMI) today announced that its fourth quarter and full year 2017 earnings release, initially scheduled for this afternoon, will now be released before the market opens on Wednesday, March 14, 2018, with the conference call now scheduled that morning at 8:00 am Eastern Time.
Webcast:
The available in the investor relations section of the Companyâ€™s website at www.chmireit.com . To listen to a live broadcast, go to the site at least 15 minutes prior to the scheduled start time in order to register, download and install any necessary audio software.
To Participate in the Telephone Conference Call:
Dial in at least 5 minutes prior to start time:
Domestic: 1-877-407-9716
International: 1-201-493-6779
Conference Call Playback:
Domestic: 1-844-512-2921
International: 1-412-317-6671
Replay Pin Number: 13677719
The playback can be accessed through April 14, 2018.
About Cherry Hill Mortgage Investment Corporation
Cherry Hill Mortgage Investment Corporation is a real estate finance company that acquires, invests in and manages residential mortgage assets in the United States. For additional information, visit www.chmireit.com .
